ProjectTitle: The quantity and quality of telecommuting: Explaining the consequences for employees and teams based on self-determination theory
InitialFeedbackHistory: 13/06/2023 [REDACTED] and [REDACTED] please note that onedrive is an online cloud storage solution, data is not stored at KU [REDACTED] onedrive is also not suitable for long term preservation since it is linked to the user's account and expires when they leave KU [REDACTED] for more information see https://icts.kuleuven.be/sc/english/storage/onedrive; consult the storage guide to find alternatives (https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en). [REDACTED] sure to use the storage solutions approved in your PRET application. [REDACTED] you mention that there are no restrictions for sharing, it may be easier to use a data repository for both data preservation and sharing, for example KU [REDACTED] RDR (https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr) or a disciplinary repository; if the data is not fully anonymous, you can keep the files restricted and give access upon request, for more information see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing
label: good with suggestions
